item.title: Preparation for Next Opportunity
item.description: I NEED TO/HAVE TO LEAVE THIS TEAM. I DONâ€™T WANT TO STAY HERE ANY MORE: petty coworkers, boring projects and manager with bad attitude TIMELINE May - June: two months to hone/document your basic knowledge on GLM/R coding/AB testing/working experiences. (and publish your blog) July - Sep: learn through interview questions online or start applying small companies for practice Sep - Oct: start looking for jobs/applying
